item.title: Which sector will prevail in the current market?
item.author: Alexander Koh,
item.description: In an economically uncertain environment subject to policy-driven volatility, the underperformers would be high beta stocks such as the technology sector. item.title: Educational: Performing Absolute Evaluation
item.author: Alexander Koh,
item.description: Investors are typically faced with the question of how much a stock (equity) is worth. To answer this question, there are two ways to value equities. item.title: An Insight into ETFs - The Future of Investing
item.author: Alexander Koh,
item.description: Index funds refer to a mutual fund or Exchange Traded Fund (ETF) that track a specified basket of underlying securities (tradable financial assets). item.title: Bond Curve Yield Inversion
item.author: Alexander Koh,
item.description: Yield curve inversions have traditionally been a foretelling sign of impending recessions. To explain the idea of a yield curve, one needs to understand what exactly a yield is. A yield to maturity, or simply bond yield has multiple interpretation, the simplest being – it is the return an investor …
